hooks.command: echo 'Session Context: For complex development tasks requiring 3+ specialized agents with sequential dependencies (e.g., implement + test + document + deploy), proactively consider using the workflow-orchestrator agent to coordinate multi-phase workflows.'

echo '
PARALLELIZATION ANALYSIS REQUIRED:

Before executing, analyze this request for parallel agent opportunities:

1. Identify all specialized domains involved
2. Determine which work can proceed independently
3. If 2+ agents can work in parallel, USE Task tool with parallel invocations
4. Single-agent execution only if task requires single specialization

HIGH-VALUE PARALLEL PATTERNS:
• Multi-domain review → Use parallel specialized reviewers
• Implementation + testing → Use implementation agent || test-automator
• Testing + documentation → Use test-automator || documentation-engineer  
• Security + performance analysis → Use security-auditor || performance-engineer
• Database + API optimization → Use database-optimizer || api-designer
• Multi-component updates → Use domain-specific agents in parallel

SINGLE-AGENT PATTERNS:
• Specific bug fixes → debugger only
• Code explanation → single analysis
• Focused reviews → single reviewer

Agent roster: code-reviewer, test-automator, qa-expert, performance-engineer, security-auditor, documentation-engineer, database-optimizer, kubernetes-specialist, backend-developer, django-developer, python-pro, api-designer, microservices-architect, postgres-pro, eventsourcing-expert, debugger, research-analyst, architect-reviewer, penetration-tester.
'
